title: The Apartment = L'Appartement
creator_credit: Gilles Mimouni, Georges Benayoun, Tiger Cinematographica, Cecchi Gori Group, Mate Production, M6 Films, La Sept Cinema, UGC Images and Ima Films
brief_description: This romantic thriller simply exudes confidence from the word go. Max, the romantic protagonist, is planning a marriage, investigating a murder, chasing after a lost love and getting bizarrely hooked up with a mystery girl. Fusing atmospheric street scenes, a beautiful Parisian apartment, and chic cafes with unpredictable plot twists and pungent symbolism, Max is nonchalantly entwined in the passion driven fates of three beautiful women. In French with English subtitles.
